content.prompt: In the passage, Pliny is concerned that the Nicomedians

choices.label: have a lot of money to spend on public projects
have been neglected by the Roman government
lack the engineering ability to build good aqueducts

unit.text: 3: Pliny's Letters: Ghosts and Apparitions, Letters to Trajan and Calpurnia, and Teacher's Choice - Latin Prose
